title: 5 RP
body: I right now have 435 RP and am going to buy 10$ of RP (1380) for DawnBringer Riven. My problem is, though I would be 5 RP off. Is it possible for a riot member to give me 5 RP in exchange for something?

replies.body:
Y'know, the resident poros have been craving a nice drawing of a poro snack to nibble on. If you throw some artwork my way, I might be able to work something out!

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

He's adorable I love him and will protect this precious baby forever!

Next time you login in, you might find a surprise the poros left for you. Keep in mind it may not happen again in the future!
